name: Gluttony, My Master
description:
This was my entry for the Festive GMC Jam 35 (Nov 28th - Dec 2nd). The theme was 'SUPERNATURAL'.

The game takes loose inspiration from Asian folklore, where the concept of hungry ghosts appears. You are a being newly born into the realm of hungry ghosts; you devote your time to serving the Monarch by removing fat from Its belly, so It may continue to perform Its duty.

Last modified: 18/12/2019
